amendment.description: To ensure that women and children have access to basic protection and assistance services in complex humanitarian emergencies.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1998 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1998 proposed by Senator Landrieu. (consideration: CR S13358-13360, S13367; text: CR S13358) To ensure that women and children have access to basic protection and assistance services in complex humanitarian emergencies.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1998 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1998 proposed by Senator Landrieu.
